raw_comment:
What do you notice? 
 I notice that the wealthier someone is the more likely they are to get into a college compared to their less wealthy peers. 
What do you wonder?
 I wonder if this is because the wealthier someone is the more money they can donate to the college which makes them more likely to get in. 
How does this relate to you and your community?
 This relates to me and my community because it can impact someone I know and their future since college is such an important part of someone's life.
Create a catchy headline that captures the graph's main idea.
 Finances and College admissions.
ace_sentences: I notice a correlation between wealth and college admission.
If a person is wealthier then the person is more likely to get into a college than a less wealthy peer.
I wonder about the cause of this correlation.
A wealthier person can donate more money to a college than a less wealthy person.
If a person donates more money to a college then the person may be more likely to get into the college.
This situation relates to me and my community.
This situation can impact a person whom I know.
College is an important part of a person's life.
If a person cannot get into a college then the future of the person can be affected.
The headline is: Finances and college admissions.
